meanings.sent1: The howdied from my friend made me smile.
meanings.sent2: I always respond to a howdied with a smile.
meanings.sent3: The cat gave a little howdied by purring softly.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden whispered a fragrant howdied to the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The cheerful howdied of the birds greeted the morning.

meanings.definition: To greet or say hello to someone.
meanings.sent1: I howdied my neighbor when I saw her outside.
meanings.sent2: Remember to howdied politely when meeting someone new.
meanings.sent3: The dog howdied by wagging its tail enthusiastically.
meanings.sent4: The sun howdied the world with its warm rays.
meanings.sent5: The wind howdied through the trees, rustling the leaves.
